item.title: CVE-2024-6508|2024-10-16T06:40:55.650Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openshift%20container%20platform%204.17
item.description: An insufficient entropy vulnerability was found in the Openshift Console. In the authorization code type and implicit grant type, the OAuth2 protocol is vulnerable to a Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attack if the state parameter is used inefficiently. This flaw allows logging into the victimâ€™s current application account using a third-party account without any restrictions.
